Name: Stench
Old Description: By releasing stench when attacking this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

Name: Drizzle
Old Description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

Name: Speed Boost
Old Description: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.

Name: Battle Armor
Old Description: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

Name: Sturdy
Old Description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out either.

Name: Damp
Old Description: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.

Name: Limber
Old Description: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.

Name: Sand Veil
Old Description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in a sandstorm.

Name: Static
Old Description: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity so contact with it may cause paralysis.

Name: Volt Absorb
Old Description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.

Name: Water Absorb
Old Description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move instead of taking damage.

Name: Oblivious
Old Description: The Pokémon is oblivious and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

Name: Cloud Nine
Old Description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

Name: Compound Eyes
Old Description: The Pokémon’s compound eyes boost its accuracy.

Name: Insomnia
Old Description: The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.

Name: Color Change
Old Description: The Pokémon’s type becomes the type of the move used on it.

Name: Immunity
Old Description: The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.

Name: Flash Fire
Old Description: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.

Name: Shield Dust
Old Description: This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.

Name: Own Tempo
Old Description: This Pokémon has its own tempo and that prevents it from becoming confused.

Name: Suction Cups
Old Description: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.

Name: Intimidate
Old Description: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle lowering their Attack stat.

Name: Shadow Tag
Old Description: This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon’s shadow to prevent it from escaping.

Name: Rough Skin
Old Description: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.

Name: Wonder Guard
Old Description: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.

Name: Levitate
Old Description: By floating in the air the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

Name: Effect Spore
Old Description: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison sleep or paralysis on its attacker.

Name: Synchronize
Old Description: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn poison or paralysis to the Pokémon.

Name: Clear Body
Old Description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

Name: Natural Cure
Old Description: All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.

Name: Lightning Rod
Old Description: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves it boosts its Sp. Atk.

Name: Serene Grace
Old Description: Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.

Name: Swift Swim
Old Description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

Name: Chlorophyll
Old Description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

Name: Illuminate
Old Description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.

Name: Trace
Old Description: When it enters a battle the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.

Name: Huge Power
Old Description: Doubles the Pokémon’s Attack stat.

Name: Poison Point
Old Description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

Name: Inner Focus
Old Description: The Pokémon’s intensely focused and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.

Name: Magma Armor
Old Description: The Pokémon is covered with hot magma which prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

Name: Water Veil
Old Description: The Pokémon is covered with a water veil which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

Name: Magnet Pull
Old Description: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.

Name: Soundproof
Old Description: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.

Name: Rain Dish
Old Description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

Name: Sand Stream
Old Description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

Name: Pressure
Old Description: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon it raises their PP usage.

Name: Thick Fat
Old Description: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

Name: Early Bird
Old Description: The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.

Name: Flame Body
Old Description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

Name: Run Away
Old Description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

Name: Keen Eye
Old Description: Keen eyes prevent other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon’s accuracy.

Name: Hyper Cutter
Old Description: The Pokémon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

Name: Pickup
Old Description: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle too.

Name: Truant
Old Description: The Pokémon can’t use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.

Name: Hustle
Old Description: Boosts the Attack stat but lowers accuracy.

Name: Cute Charm
Old Description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

Name: Plus
Old Description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

Name: Minus
Old Description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

Name: Forecast
Old Description: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water Fire or Ice.

Name: Sticky Hold
Old Description: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

Name: Shed Skin
Old Description: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

Name: Guts
Old Description: It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat.

Name: Marvel Scale
Old Description: The Pokémon’s marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.

Name: Liquid Ooze
Old Description: The oozed liquid has a strong stench which damages attackers using any draining move.

Name: Overgrow
Old Description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

Name: Blaze
Old Description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

Name: Torrent
Old Description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

Name: Swarm
Old Description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

Name: Rock Head
Old Description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

Name: Drought
Old Description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

Name: Arena Trap
Old Description: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing.

Name: Vital Spirit
Old Description: The Pokémon is full of vitality and that prevents it from falling asleep.

Name: White Smoke
Old Description: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Name: Pure Power
Old Description: Using its pure power the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.

Name: Shell Armor
Old Description: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

Name: Air Lock
Old Description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

Name: Tangled Feet
Old Description: Raises evasiveness if the Pokémon is confused.

Name: Motor Drive
Old Description: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.

Name: Rivalry
Old Description: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender but deals less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

Name: Steadfast
Old Description: The Pokémon’s determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.

Name: Snow Cloak
Old Description: Boosts evasiveness in a hailstorm.

Name: Gluttony
Old Description: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less which is sooner than usual.

Name: Anger Point
Old Description: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit and that maxes its Attack stat.

Name: Unburden
Old Description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon’s held item is used or lost.

Name: Heatproof
Old Description: The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.

Name: Simple
Old Description: The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.

Name: Dry Skin
Old Description: Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

Name: Download
Old Description: Compares an opposing Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.

Name: Iron Fist
Old Description: Powers up punching moves.

Name: Poison Heal
Old Description: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.

Name: Adaptability
Old Description: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

Name: Skill Link
Old Description: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.

Name: Hydration
Old Description: Heals status conditions if it’s raining.

Name: Solar Power
Old Description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight but HP decreases every turn.

Name: Quick Feet
Old Description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

Name: Normalize
Old Description: All the Pokémon’s moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

Name: Sniper
Old Description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.

Name: Magic Guard
Old Description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

Name: No Guard
Old Description: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

Name: Stall
Old Description: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

Name: Technician
Old Description: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.

Name: Leaf Guard
Old Description: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

Name: Klutz
Old Description: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.

Name: Mold Breaker
Old Description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

Name: Super Luck
Old Description: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.

Name: Aftermath
Old Description: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.

Name: Anticipation
Old Description: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon’s dangerous moves.

Name: Forewarn
Old Description: When it enters a battle the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.

Name: Unaware
Old Description: When attacking the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon’s stat changes.

Name: Tinted Lens
Old Description: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.

Name: Filter
Old Description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

Name: Slow Start
Old Description: For five turns the Pokémon’s Attack and Speed stats are halved.

Name: Scrappy
Old Description: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

Name: Storm Drain
Old Description: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit by Water-type moves it boosts its Sp. Atk.

Name: Ice Body
Old Description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

Name: Solid Rock
Old Description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

Name: Snow Warning
Old Description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.

Name: Honey Gather
Old Description: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

Name: Frisk
Old Description: When it enters a battle the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.

Name: Reckless
Old Description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

Name: Multitype
Old Description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the Plate or Z-Crystal it holds.

Name: Flower Gift
Old Description: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies in harsh sunlight.

Name: Bad Dreams
Old Description: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.

Name: Pickpocket
Old Description: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.

Name: Sheer Force
Old Description: Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.

Name: Contrary
Old Description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

Name: Unnerve
Old Description: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

Name: Defiant
Old Description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.

Name: Defeatist
Old Description: Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.

Name: Cursed Body
Old Description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

Name: Healer
Old Description: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.

Name: Friend Guard
Old Description: Reduces damage done to allies.

Name: Weak Armor
Old Description: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.

Name: Heavy Metal
Old Description: Doubles the Pokémon’s weight.

Name: Light Metal
Old Description: Halves the Pokémon’s weight.

Name: Multiscale
Old Description: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

Name: Toxic Boost
Old Description: Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.

Name: Flare Boost
Old Description: Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.

Name: Harvest
Old Description: May create another Berry after one is used.

Name: Telepathy
Old Description: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.

Name: Moody
Old Description: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.

Name: Overcoat
Old Description: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand hail and powder.

Name: Poison Touch
Old Description: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

Name: Regenerator
Old Description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

Name: Big Pecks
Old Description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.

Name: Sand Rush
Old Description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a sandstorm.

Name: Wonder Skin
Old Description: Makes status moves more likely to miss.

Name: Analytic
Old Description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

Name: Illusion
Old Description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party’s last spot.

Name: Imposter
Old Description: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.

Name: Infiltrator
Old Description: Passes through the opposing Pokémon’s barrier substitute and the like and strikes.

Name: Mummy
Old Description: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.

Name: Moxie
Old Description: The Pokémon shows moxie and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.

Name: Justified
Old Description: Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon for justice.

Name: Rattled
Old Description: Dark- Ghost- and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.

Name: Magic Bounce
Old Description: Reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.

Name: Sap Sipper
Old Description: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.

Name: Prankster
Old Description: Gives priority to a status move.

Name: Sand Force
Old Description: Boosts the power of Rock- Ground- and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

Name: Iron Barbs
Old Description: Inflicts damage on the attacker upon contact with iron barbs.

Name: Zen Mode
Old Description: Changes the Pokémon’s shape when HP is half or less.

Name: Victory Star
Old Description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

Name: Turboblaze
Old Description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

Name: Teravolt
Old Description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

Name: Aroma Veil
Old Description: Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

Name: Flower Veil
Old Description: Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

Name: Cheek Pouch
Old Description: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

Name: Protean
Old Description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.

Name: Fur Coat
Old Description: Halves the damage from physical moves.

Name: Magician
Old Description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

Name: Bulletproof
Old Description: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

Name: Competitive
Old Description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.

Name: Strong Jaw
Old Description: The Pokémon’s strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.

Name: Refrigerate
Old Description: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

Name: Sweet Veil
Old Description: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

Name: Stance Change
Old Description: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King’s Shield.

Name: Gale Wings
Old Description: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is full.

Name: Mega Launcher
Old Description: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

Name: Grass Pelt
Old Description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat on Grassy Terrain.

Name: Symbiosis
Old Description: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.

Name: Tough Claws
Old Description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

Name: Pixilate
Old Description: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

Name: Gooey
Old Description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

Name: Aerilate
Old Description: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

Name: Parental Bond
Old Description: Parent and child each attacks.

Name: Dark Aura
Old Description: Powers up each Pokémon’s Dark-type moves.

Name: Fairy Aura
Old Description: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.

Name: Aura Break
Old Description: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.

Name: Primordial Sea
Old Description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

Name: Desolate Land
Old Description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

Name: Delta Stream
Old Description: The Pokémon changes the weather to eliminate all of the Flying type’s weaknesses.

Name: Stamina
Old Description: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

Name: Wimp Out
Old Description: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

Name: Emergency Exit
Old Description: The Pokémon sensing danger switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

Name: Water Compaction
Old Description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.

Name: Merciless
Old Description: The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

Name: Shields Down
Old Description: When its HP becomes half or less the Pokémon’s shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

Name: Stakeout

Name: Water Bubble
Old Description: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

Name: Steelworker
Old Description: Powers up Steel-type moves.

Name: Berserk
Old Description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

Name: Slush Rush
Old Description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

Name: Long Reach
Old Description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

Name: Liquid Voice
Old Description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

Name: Triage
Old Description: Gives priority to a healing move.

Name: Galvanize
Old Description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

Name: Surge Surfer
Old Description: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

Name: Schooling
Old Description: When it has a lot of HP the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

Name: Disguise
Old Description: Once per battle the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

Name: Battle Bond
Old Description: Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the Pokémon’s bond with its Trainer and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.

Name: Power Construct
Old Description: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.

Name: Corrosion

Name: Comatose
Old Description: It’s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.

Name: Queenly Majesty
Old Description: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon making it unable to attack using priority moves.

Name: Innards Out
Old Description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.

Name: Dancer
Old Description: When another Pokémon uses a dance move it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.

Name: Battery
Old Description: Powers up ally Pokémon’s special moves.

Name: Fluffy
Old Description: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

Name: Dazzling
Old Description: Surprises the opposing Pokémon making it unable to attack using priority moves.

Name: Soul-Heart
Old Description: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.

Name: Tangling Hair
Old Description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

Name: Receiver
Old Description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

Name: Power of Alchemy
Old Description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

Name: Beast Boost
Old Description: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

Name: RKS System
Old Description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.

Name: Electric Surge
Old Description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

Name: Psychic Surge
Old Description: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

Name: Misty Surge
Old Description: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

Name: Grassy Surge
Old Description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

Name: Full Metal Body
Old Description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

Name: Shadow Shield
Old Description: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
